casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Joseph MOORE. No. 460A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Moore. Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of November 2007 by Defendant to Correct Brief:

*669"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
